subject: p16751749
History: History of COPD and pneumothorax, chest tube. Evaluation for tube placement.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the right-sided chest tube is in unchanged position. Unchanged massive soft tissue air collection. An intrathoracic pneumothorax cannot be detected. Unchanged opacity at the right lung base and in the left lung apex. Unchanged size of the cardiac silhouette.
